svg.content: <mxfile host="app.diagrams.net" modified="2023-12-10T11:14:27.651Z" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/120.0.0.0 Safari/537.36" etag="b0JlihpY0LekCZAZqBxm" version="22.1.7" type="device"> <diagram name="Page-1" id="NLrXnQrG14Ck7-FcRHE6"> <mxGraphModel dx="2074" dy="1140" grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="827" pageHeight="1169" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <mxCell id="1fo8vky2u005k4geEmfY-1" value="" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="110" y="270" width="550" height="130" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="1fo8vky2u005k4geEmfY-3" value="Destination MAC Address" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="130" y="290" width="190" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="1fo8vky2u005k4geEmfY-5" value="Source MAC Address" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="330" y="290" width="190" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="1fo8vky2u005k4geEmfY-6" value="EtherType" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="530" y="290" width="100" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="1fo8vky2u005k4geEmfY-7" value="<b>MAC Header</b><br>(14 bytes)" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="320" y="360" width="130" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="1fo8vky2u005k4geEmfY-8" value="" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="680" y="270" width="300" height="130" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="1fo8vky2u005k4geEmfY-9" value="Payload" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="700" y="290" width="260" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="1fo8vky2u005k4geEmfY-10" value="<b>Data</b><br>(46- 1500 bytes)" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="770" y="360" width="120" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="1fo8vky2u005k4geEmfY-11" value="" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="1000" y="270" width="200" height="130" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="1fo8vky2u005k4geEmfY-12" value="CRC Checksum" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="1020" y="290" width="160" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="1fo8vky2u005k4geEmfY-13" value="(4 bytes)" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="1040" y="360" width="120" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="1fo8vky2u005k4geEmfY-14" value="" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="90" y="200" width="1130" height="220" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="1fo8vky2u005k4geEmfY-15" value="<b style="font-size: 18px;">Ethernet Type II Frame<br></b>(64 - 1518 bytes)" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="550" y="220" width="240" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>
